summary: Email correspondence between Assistant United States Attorneys regarding the final review and imminent presentation of an indictment against Ghislaine Maxwell to a White Plains grand jury. The email indicates the indictment process moved quickly and had undergone several rounds of edits.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Identified as the defendant in the indictment being presented to the grand jury.

events.title: Grand Jury Presentation of Maxwell Indictment
events.description: Planned presentation of an indictment against Ghislaine Maxwell to the White Plains grand jury.

keyFacts: An indictment against Ghislaine Maxwell was being finalized for presentation to a White Plains grand jury on June 29, 2020.
The indictment process moved more quickly than expected, according to the prosecutor.
The document is an internal email between prosecutors in the Southern District of New York regarding case coordination.
